meanings.definition: A genre of popular music characterized by the use of synthesizers and electronic sounds.
meanings.sent1: I love listening to synthpop on my music player.
meanings.sent2: The radio station played a catchy synthpop song yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The robot danced to the synthpop music, amusing the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like synthpop, electronic and captivating.
meanings.sent5: The concert was a blast with the vibrant synthpop beats.

meanings.definition: A song or piece of music created in the synthpop style.
meanings.sent1: The band released a new synthpop that became an instant hit.
meanings.sent2: She composed a beautiful synthpop melody on her keyboard.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to enjoy the synthpop tune, purring along.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed like a lyrical synthpop, enchanting the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The party atmosphere was set by the lively synthpop track.
